   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          ms_enable_flags/1,
   36:          return_to/1,
   37:          destroy/1,
   38:          negative/1,
   39:          error_info/1,
   40:          end_of_list/1]).
   41: 
   42: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   43: 
   44: 
   45: -undef(line).
   46: -ifdef(debug).
   47: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   48: -else.
   49: -define(line,void).
   50: -endif.
   51: 
   52: -export([foo/0, exported/1, middle/1, bottom/1]).
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   56:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [
   60:      basic,
   61:      call,
   62:      meta,
   63:      ms_enable_flags,
   64:      on_load,
   65:      trace_info_on_load,
   66:      procs,
   67:      test_set_on_spawn,
   68:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   69:      test_set_on_link,
   70:      test_set_on_first_link,
   71:      return_to,
   72:      destroy,
   73:      negative,
   74:      error_info,
   75:      end_of_list].
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   79:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   83:         false ->
   84:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   85:         true ->
   86:             ignore
   87:     end.
   88: 
   89: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   90:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   91: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   92:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   93: 
   94: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   95:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   96: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList0) ->
   97:     FlagList1 = lists:keydelete(tracer, 1, FlagList0),
   98:     FlagList3 = case lists:keytake(meta, 1, FlagList1) of
   99:                     {value, {meta,_Tracer}, FlagList2} ->
  100:                         [meta | FlagList2];
  101:                     false ->
  102:                         FlagList1
  103:                 end,
  104:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList3).
  105: 
  106: 
  107: on_load(_Config) ->
  108:     Tester= self(),
  109:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  110:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  111:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  112:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  113:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  114:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  115: 
  116:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  117:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  118:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  119: 
  120:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  121:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  122:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  123:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  124:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  125:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  126:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  127: 
  128:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  129:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  130:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  131:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  132: 
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  136:     Tester = self(),
  137:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  138:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  139:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  140:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  141:     {all,[{traced,global},
  142:       {match_spec,[]},
  143:       {meta,false},
  144:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  145:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  149:     Tracee = self(),
  150:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  151:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  152:     dummy:module_info(),
  153:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  154:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  155:     ?line,
  156:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  157:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  158:     dummy:module_info(),
  159:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  160:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  161:     ?line,
  162:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  163:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  164:     ok.
  165: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  166:     Tracee = self(),
  167:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  168:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  169:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  170:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  171:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  172:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  173:     dummy:module_info(),
  174:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  175:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  176:     ?line,
  177:     receive_unsorted(
  178:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  179:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  180:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  181:     dummy:module_info(),
  182:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  183:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  184:     ?line,
  185:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  186:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  187:     dummy:module_info(),
  188:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  189:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  190:     ?line,
  191:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  192: 
  193:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  194:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  198:     Tester= self(),
  199:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  200:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  201:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  202:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  203:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  204:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  205: 
  206:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  207:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  208:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  209:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  210:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  211:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  212:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  213: 
  214:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  215:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  216:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  217:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  218: 
  219:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  220:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  221:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  222: 
  223:     unlink(Tracer0),
  224:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  225:     unlink(Tracer1),
  226:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  227:     unlink(Tracer2),
  228:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  229:     ok.
  230: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  231:     Tester= self(),
  232:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  233:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  234:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  235:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  236:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  237:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  238: 
  239:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  240:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  241:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  242:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  243:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  244:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  245:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  246: 
  247:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  248:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  249:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  250:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  251: 
  252:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  253:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  254:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  255: 
  256:     unlink(Tracer0),
  257:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  258:     unlink(Tracer1),
  259:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  260:     unlink(Tracer2),
  261:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  262:     ok.
  263: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  264:     Tester= self(),
  265:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  266:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  267:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  268:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  269:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  270:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  271: 
  272:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  273:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  274:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  275:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  276:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  277:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  278:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  279: 
  280:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  281:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  282:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  283:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  284:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  285:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  286:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  287: 
  288:     unlink(Tracer0),
  289:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  290:     unlink(Tracer1),
  291:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  292:     unlink(Tracer2),
  293:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  297:     Tester= self(),
  298:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  299:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  300:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  301:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  302:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  303:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  304: 
  305:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  306:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  307:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  308:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  309:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  310:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  311:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  312: 
  313:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  314:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  315:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  316:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  317:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  318:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  319:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  320: 
  321:     unlink(Tracer0),
  322:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  323:     unlink(Tracer1),
  324:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  325:     unlink(Tracer2),
  326:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  327:     ok.
  328: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  329:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  330:     Tracee = self(),
  331:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  332:                           receive hej ->
  333:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  334:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  335:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  336:                                   F()
  337:                           end
  338:                   end),
  339:     Child ! hej,
  340:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  341:     exit(Child, die),
  342:     receive_parallel(
  343:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  344: 
  345:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  346:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  347:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  348: 
  349:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  350:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  351:       }),
  352:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  353:     ok.
  354: 
  355: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  356:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  357:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  358:     Tracee = self(),
  359:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  360:                           receive hej ->
  361:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  362:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  363:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  364:                                   F()
  365:                           end
  366:                   end),
  367:     Child ! hej,
  368:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  369:     exit(Child, die),
  370:     receive_parallel(
  371:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  372: 
  373:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  374: 
  375:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  376:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  377:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  378: 
  379:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  380:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  381:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  382: 
  383:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  384:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  385: 
  386:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  387:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  388:       }),
  389: 
  390:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  391: 
  392:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  393:                            receive hej ->
  394:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  395:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  396:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  397:                                    F()
  398:                            end
  399:                    end),
  400:     Child1 ! hej,
  401:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  402:     exit(Child1, die),
  403:     receive_parallel(
  404:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  405: 
  406:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  407:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  408:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  409: 
  410:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  411:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  412:       }),
  413: 
  414:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  415:     ok.
  416: 
  417: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  418:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  419:     Tracee = self(),
  420:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  421:                                 receive hej ->
  422:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  423:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  424:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  425:                                         F()
  426:                                 end
  427:                         end),
  428:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  429:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  430:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  431:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  432:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  433:     receive_parallel(
  434:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  435:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  436: 
  437:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  438:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  439:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  440: 
  441:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  442:     ok.
  443: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  444:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  445:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  446:     Tracee = self(),
  447:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  448:                                 receive hej ->
  449:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  450:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  451:                                         Tracee ! done,
  452:                                         F()
  453:                                 end
  454:                         end),
  455:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  456:     receive done -> ok end,
  457:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  458:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  459:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  460:     receive_parallel(
  461:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  462:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  463: 
  464:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  465:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  466: 
  467:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  468:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  469:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  470: 
  471:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  472:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  473:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  474:       }),
  475: 
  476:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  477:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  478:                                  receive hej ->
  479:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  480:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  481:                                          F()
  482:                                  end
  483:                          end),
  484:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  485:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  486:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  487:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  488: 
  489:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  490:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  491:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  492:     ok.
  493: 
  494: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  495:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  496:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  497:     Tracee = self(),
  498:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  499:     unlink(Child),
  500:     exit(Child, die),
  501:     receive_parallel(
  502:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  503:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  504:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  505: 
  506:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  507:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  508:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  509:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  510:       }),
  511: 
  512:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  513:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  514:     link(Child2),
  515:     unlink(Child2),
  516:     exit(Child2, die),
  517:     receive_parallel(
  518:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  519:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  520:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  521: 
  522:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  523:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  524:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  525:        }),
  526: 
  527:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  528:     %% from child process
  529:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  530:     link(Child3),
  531:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  532:     unlink(Child3),
  533:     exit(Child3, die),
  534:     receive_parallel(
  535:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  536:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  537: 
  538:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  539:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  540:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  541:       }),
  542: 
  543:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  544:     %% and get messages from the parent
  545:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  546:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  547:     link(Child4),
  548:     receive_parallel(
  549:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  550:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  551: 
  552:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  553:       }),
  554:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  555:     unlink(Child4),
  556:     exit(Child4, die),
  557:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  558: 
  559:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  560:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  561:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  562:     ok.
  563: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  564:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  565:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  566:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  567:     Tracee = self(),
  568:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  569:     unlink(Child),
  570:     exit(Child, die),
  571: 
  572:     receive_parallel(
  573:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  574:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  575:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  576: 
  577:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  578:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  579:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  580: 
  581:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  582:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  583:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  584:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  585: 
  586:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  587:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  588:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  589:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  590:       }),
  591: 
  592:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  593:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  594:     ?line,
  595:     link(Child1),
  596:     unlink(Child1),
  597:     exit(Child1, die),
  598: 
  599:     receive_parallel(
  600:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  601:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  602:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  603: 
  604:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  605:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  606:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  607: 
  608:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  609:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  610:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  611: 
  612:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  613:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  614:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  615:       }),
  616: 
  617:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  618:     %% via spawn_link/1
  619:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  620:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  621:     unlink(Child2),
  622:     exit(Child2, die),
  623:     receive_parallel(
  624:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  625:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  626:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  627: 
  628:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  629:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  630:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  631:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  632:       }),
  633:     %% Test with link/1
  634:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  635:     link(Child21),
  636:     unlink(Child21),
  637:     exit(Child21, die),
  638:     receive_parallel(
  639:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  640:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  641:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  642: 
  643:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  644:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  645:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  646:       }),
  647:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  648:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  649:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  650:     link(Child11),
  651:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  652:     receive_parallel(
  653:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  654:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  655: 
  656:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  657:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  658: 
  659:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  660: 
  661:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  662:       }),
  663:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  664:     unlink(Child11),
  665:     exit(Child11, die),
  666:     receive_parallel(
  667:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  668: 
  669:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  670: 
  671:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  672:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  673:       }),
  674: 
  675:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  676:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  677:     ok.
  678: 
  679: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  680:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  681:     Tracee = self(),
  682:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  683:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  684:     unlink(Child),
  685:     exit(Child, die),
  686:     unlink(Child1),
  687:     exit(Child1, die),
  688:     receive_parallel(
  689:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  690:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  691:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  692:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  693:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  694:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  695: 
  696:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  697:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  698:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  699:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  700:       }),
  701:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  702:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  703:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  704:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  705:     link(Child2),
  706:     link(Child21),
  707:     unlink(Child2),
  708:     unlink(Child21),
  709:     exit(Child2, die),
  710:     exit(Child21,die),
  711:     receive_parallel(
  712:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  713:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  714:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  715:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  716:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  717:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  718: 
  719:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  720:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  721:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  722:       }),
  723:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  724:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  725:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  726:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  727:                                       Tracee ! done,
  728:                                       F()
  729:                               end
  730:                    end),
  731:     link(Child3),
  732:     Child3 ! hej,
  733:     receive done -> ok end,
  734:     unlink(Child3),
  735:     exit(Child3, die),
  736:     receive_parallel(
  737:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  738:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  739:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  740: 
  741:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  742:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  743:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  744:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  745:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  746:       }),
  747:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  748:     ok.
  749: 
  750: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  751:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  752:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  753:     Tracee = self(),
  754:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  755:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  756:     receive_parallel(
  757:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  758:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  759:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  760:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  761: 
  762:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  763:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  764:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  765:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  766: 
  767:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  768:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  769: 
  770:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  771:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  772:        }),
  773: 
  774:     unlink(Child),
  775:     exit(Child, die),
  776:     unlink(Child1),
  777:     exit(Child1, die),
  778:     receive_parallel(
  779:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  780:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  781: 
  782:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  783:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  784: 
  785:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  786:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  787: 
  788:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  789:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  790:       }),
  791: 
  792:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  793:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  794:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  795:     unlink(Child2),
  796:     exit(Child2, die),
  797:     unlink(Child21),
  798:     exit(Child21, die),
  799:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  800:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  801:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  802:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  803:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  804:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  805:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  806:     ok.
  807: procs(_Config) ->
  808:     Tester= self(),
  809:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  810:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  811:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  812: 
  813:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  814: 
  815:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  816:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  817:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  818: 
  819:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  820:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  821:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  822:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  823:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  824:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  825: 
  826:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  827:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  828:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  829:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  830: 
  831:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  832:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  833:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  834: 
  835:     unlink(Tracer0),
  836:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  837:     unlink(Tracer1),
  838:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  839:     unlink(Tracer2),
  840:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  841:     ok.
  842: 
  843: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  844:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  845: 
  846:     Tracee = self(),
  847:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  848:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  849:     unregister(RegName),
  850:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  851:     link(Child),
  852:     unlink(Child),
  853:     exit(Child, die),
  854:     receive_parallel(
  855:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  856:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  857:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  858:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  859:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  860: 
  861:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  862:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  863:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  864:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  865:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  866: 
  867:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  868:     unregister(RegName),
  869:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  870:     link(Child1),
  871:     unlink(Child1),
  872:     exit(Child1, die),
  873: 
  874:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  875: 
  876:     ok.
  877: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  878:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  879:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  880: 
  881:     Tracee = self(),
  882:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  883:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  884:     unregister(RegName),
  885:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  886:     link(Child),
  887:     unlink(Child),
  888:     exit(Child, die),
  889:     receive_parallel(
  890:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  891:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  892:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  893:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  894:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  895: 
  896:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  897:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  898:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  899:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  900:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  901: 
  902:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  903:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  904:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  905:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  906: 
  907:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  908:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  909:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  910:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  911:       }),
  912: 
  913:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  914:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  915:     unregister(RegName),
  916:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  917:     link(Child1),
  918:     unlink(Child1),
  919:     exit(Child1, die),
  920:     receive_parallel(
  921:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  922:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  923:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  924:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  925:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  926: 
  927:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  928:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  929:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  930:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  931:       }),
  932: 
  933:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  934:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  935:     unregister(RegName),
  936:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  937:     link(Child2),
  938:     unlink(Child2),
  939:     exit(Child2, die),
  940:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  941:     ok.
  942: 
  943: basic(_Config) ->
  944:     Tester = self(),
  945:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  946:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  947:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  948: 
  949:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  950: 
  951:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  952:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  953:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  954: 
  955:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  956:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  957:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  958:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  959:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  960:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  961: 
  962:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  963:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  964:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  965:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  966: 
  967:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  968:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  969:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  970: 
  971:     unlink(Tracer0),
  972:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  973:     unlink(Tracer1),
  974:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  975:     unlink(Tracer2),
  976:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  977: 
  978:     ok.
  979: 
  980: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  981:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  982: 
  983:     Tracee = self(),
  984:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  985:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  986:     unregister(RegName),
  987: 
  988:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  989:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  990: 
  991:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  992: 
  993:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  994:     unregister(RegName),
  995: 
  996:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  997: 
  998:     ok.
  999: 
 1000: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
 1001:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
 1002:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
 1003: 
 1004:     Tracee = self(),
 1005:     RegName = ?MODULE,
 1006:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1007:     unregister(RegName),
 1008: 
 1009:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1010:                        {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}],
 1011: 
 1012:                       [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1013:                        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]}),
 1014: 
 1015:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1016: 
 1017:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1018:     unregister(RegName),
 1019: 
 1020:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1021:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1022: 
 1023:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1024: 
 1025:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1026:     unregister(RegName),
 1027: 
 1028:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1029: 
 1030:     ok.
 1031: 
 1032: 
 1033: call(_Config) ->
 1034:     Tester = self(),
 1035:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1036:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1037:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1038: 
 1039:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1040: 
 1041:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1042:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1043:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1044: 
 1045:     [begin
 1046:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1047:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1048:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1049:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1050:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1051:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1052:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1053: 
 1054:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1055:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1056:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1057:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1058:      end
 1059:      || CallType <- [
 1060:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1061:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1062:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1063:     ],
 1064: 
 1065:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1066:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1067:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1068: 
 1069:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1070:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1071:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1072:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1073:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1074:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1075: 
 1076:     ok.
 1077: 
 1078: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1079:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1080:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1081:     Tracee = self(),
 1082:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1083:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1084: 
 1085:     foo(),
 1086: 
 1087:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1088: 
 1089:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1090: 
 1091:     foo(),
 1092:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1093: 
 1094:     ok.
 1095: 
 1096: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1097:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1098:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1099:     Tracee = self(),
 1100:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1101:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1102: 
 1103:     ?line,
 1104:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1105:     Call(),
 1106:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1107:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1108: 
 1109:     ?line,
 1110:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1111:     Call(),
 1112:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1113:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1114:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1115: 
 1116:     ?line,
 1117:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1118:     Call(),
 1119:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1120:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1121: 
 1122:     ?line,
 1123:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1124:     Call(),
 1125:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1126:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1127:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1128: 
 1129:     ?line,
 1130:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1131:     Call(),
 1132:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1133:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1134: 
 1135:     ?line,
 1136:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1137:     Call(),
 1138:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1139:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1140:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1141: 
 1142:     ?line,
 1143:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1144:     Call(),
 1145:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1146:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1147: 
 1148:     ?line,
 1149:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1150:     Call(),
 1151:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1152: 
 1153:     ?line,
 1154:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1155:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1156:     Call(),
 1157:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1158: 
 1159:     ok.
 1160: 
 1161: meta(_Config) ->
 1162:     Tester = self(),
 1163:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1164:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1165:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1166: 
 1167:     meta_do(legacy, Tracer0, S1, Tracer1),
 1168:     meta_do(S1, Tracer1, legacy, Tracer0),
 1169: 
 1170:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1171:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1172:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1173:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1174:     ok.
 1175: 
 1176: meta_do(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2) ->
 1177:     Tester = self(),
 1178:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1179:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1180: 
 1181:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer1}]),
 1182:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer2}]),
 1183: 
 1184:     ?line,
 1185:     foo(),
 1186:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1187:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1188: 
 1189:     ?line,
 1190:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1191:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1192:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1193: 
 1194:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1195: 
 1196:     ?line,
 1197:     foo(),
 1198:     {Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1199: 
 1200:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1201:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1202: 
 1203:     ok.
 1204: 
 1205: %% Test that enable trace flags with match spec on untraced process
 1206: %% uses session tracer and not tracer of current process.
 1207: ms_enable_flags(_Config) ->
 1208:     Tester = self(),
 1209:     Dummy = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1210:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1211:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1212: 
 1213:     %% Test enable trace flag on current process
 1214:     Fun = fun(EnableSend, DisableSend) ->
 1215:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1216:                                  [{'_', [], [EnableSend]}],
 1217:                                  [meta]),
 1218: 
 1219:                   foo(),
 1220:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1221:                       = receive_any(),
 1222: 
 1223:                   {flags, [send]} = trace:info(S1, Tester, flags),
 1224:                   Dummy ! message,
 1225:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Tester, send, message, Dummy}} = receive_any(),
 1226: 
 1227:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1228:                                  [{'_', [], [DisableSend]}],
 1229:                                  [meta]),
 1230:                   Dummy ! message,
 1231:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Tester, send, message, Dummy}} = receive_any(),
 1232:                   foo(),
 1233:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1234:                       = receive_any(),
 1235:                   {flags, []} = trace:info(S1, Tester, flags),
 1236:                   timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1237:                   ok
 1238:           end,
 1239:     Fun({trace, [], [send]}, {trace, [send], []}),
 1240:     Fun({enable_trace, send}, {disable_trace, send}),
 1241: 
 1242:     %% Test enable trace flag on other process
 1243:     Other = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1244:     Fun2 = fun(EnableRecv, DisableRecv) ->
 1245:                    trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1246:                                   [{'_', [], [EnableRecv]}],
 1247:                                   [meta]),
 1248: 
 1249:                   foo(),
 1250:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1251:                        = receive_any(),
 1252: 
 1253:                   {flags, ['receive']} = trace:info(S1, Other, flags),
 1254:                   Other ! message,
 1255:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Other, 'receive', message}} = receive_any(),
 1256: 
 1257:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1258:                                  [{'_', [], [DisableRecv]}],
 1259:                                  [meta]),
 1260:                   Other ! message,
 1261:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Other, 'receive', message}} = receive_any(),
 1262:                   foo(),
 1263:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1264:                        = receive_any(),
 1265:                   {flags, []} = trace:info(S1, Other, flags),
 1266:                   timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1267: 
 1268:                   ok
 1269:           end,
 1270:     Fun2({trace, Other, [], ['receive']}, {trace, Other, ['receive'], []}),
 1271:     Fun2({enable_trace, Other, 'receive'}, {disable_trace, Other, 'receive'}),
 1272: 
 1273:     ok.
 1274: 
 1275: 
 1276: return_to(_Config) ->
 1277:     %%put(display, true),  %% To get some usable debug printouts
 1278: 
 1279:     Tester = self(),
 1280:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1281:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1282: 
 1283:     Tracee = self(),
 1284:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1285:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1286: 
 1287:     1 = trace:process(S1, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1288:     1 = trace:process(S2, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1289: 
 1290:     [begin
 1291:          Traced = [{S1, Tracer1, Funcs1},
 1292:                    {S2, Tracer2, Funcs2}],
 1293: 
 1294:          %% Set up tracing for all sessions
 1295:          [begin
 1296:               trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [local]),
 1297:               [begin
 1298:                    io_format("trace:function(~p) for tracer ~p\n", [Func, Tracer]),
 1299:                    1 = trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,Func,'_'}, true, [local])
 1300:                end
 1301:                || Func <- TracedFuncs]
 1302:           end
 1303:           || {Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1304: 
 1305:          %% Execute test with both local and external calls
 1306:          [return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced)
 1307:           || MiddleCall <- [local, extern],
 1308:              BottomCall <- [local, extern]]
 1309:      end
 1310:      || Funcs1 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]],
 1311:         Funcs2 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]]
 1312:     ],
 1313: 
 1314:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1315:     ok.
 1316: 
 1317: return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced) ->
 1318:     Tracee = self(),
 1319:     Script = [{[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {body,BottomCall}, exception],
 1320:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1321:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1322:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1323:                 }},
 1324: 
 1325:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, exception],
 1326:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1327:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1328:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1329:                 }},
 1330: 
 1331:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, exception],
 1332:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1333:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1334:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1335:                 }},
 1336: 
 1337:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall},  {body,BottomCall}, return],
 1338:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1339:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1340:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1341:                 }},
 1342: 
 1343:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, return],
 1344:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,middle}],
 1345:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1346:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1347:                 }},
 1348: 
 1349:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, return],
 1350:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,top}],
 1351:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1352:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1353:                 }}
 1354:              ],
 1355: 
 1356:     [begin
 1357:          %% Make the call sequence
 1358:          io_format("CallSequence = ~p\n", [CallSequence]),
 1359:          top(CallSequence),
 1360: 
 1361:          %% Construct expected trace messages
 1362:          Exp = [[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, CallOrReturnTo, {?MODULE, Func, 1}}}
 1363:                  || {CallOrReturnTo, Func} <- maps:get(TracedFuncs, TraceMap, [])]
 1364:                 || {_Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1365: 
 1366: 
 1367:          io_format("Exp = ~p\n", [Exp]),
 1368:          receive_parallel_list(Exp)
 1369:      end
 1370:      || {CallSequence, TraceMap} <- Script],
 1371:     ok.
 1372: 
 1373: top([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1374:     display("top(catch local)"),
 1375:     [(catch middle(T)) | 1];
 1376: top([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1377:     display("top(catch extern)"),
 1378:     [(catch ?MODULE:middle(T)) | 1].
 1379: 
 1380: middle([{body,local} | T]) ->
 1381:     display("middle(local)"),
 1382:     [bottom(T) | 1];
 1383: middle([{body,extern} | T]) ->
 1384:     display("middle(extern)"),
 1385:     [?MODULE:bottom(T) | 1];
 1386: middle([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1387:     display("middle(catch local)"),
 1388:     [(catch bottom(T)) | 1];
 1389: middle([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1390:     display("middle(catch extern)"),
 1391:     [(catch ?MODULE:bottom(T)) | 1];
 1392: middle([{tail,local} | T]) ->
 1393:     display("middle(tail local)"),
 1394:     bottom(T);
 1395: middle([{tail,extern} | T]) ->
 1396:     display("middle(tail extern)"),
 1397:     ?MODULE:bottom(T).
 1398: 
 1399: bottom([return | T]) ->
 1400:     display("bottom(return)"),
 1401:     T;
 1402: bottom([exception]) ->
 1403:     display("bottom(exception)"),
 1404:     error(exception).
 1405: 
 1406: display(Term) ->
 1407:     case get(display) of
 1408:         true ->
 1409:             erlang:display(Term);
 1410:         _ ->
 1411:             true
 1412:     end.
 1413: 
 1414: io_format(Frmt, List) ->
 1415:     case get(display) of
 1416:         true ->
 1417:             io:format(Frmt, List);
 1418:         _ ->
 1419:             ok
 1420:     end.
 1421: 
 1422: destroy(_Config) ->
 1423:     Name = ?MODULE,
 1424:     {_,SName1}=S1 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1425: 
 1426:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1427:     destroy_do(SName1, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1428: 
 1429:     {_,SName2}=S2 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1430: 
 1431:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1432:     put(session, S2),
 1433:     destroy_do(SName2, fun() -> erase(session),
 1434:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1435:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1436:                                ok
 1437:                       end),
 1438: 
 1439:     ok.
 1440: 
 1441: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1442:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1443:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1444:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1445:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1446:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1447:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1448: 
 1449:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1450:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1451:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1452:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1453:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1454:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1455:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1456:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1457:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1458: 
 1459:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1460:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1461:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1462:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1463:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1464:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1465:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1466:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1467:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1468:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1469:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1470: 
 1471:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1472:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1473:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1474:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1475:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1476:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1477:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1478:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1479:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1480: 
 1481:     Destroyer(),
 1482: 
 1483:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1484:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1485:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1486:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1487:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1488:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1489:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1490:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1491:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1492:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1493:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1494: 
 1495:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1496:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1497:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1498:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1499:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1500:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1501:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1502:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1503:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1504:     true.
 1505: 
 1506: negative(_Config) ->
 1507:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1508:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1509:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1510:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1511:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1512: 
 1513:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1514:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1515:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1516:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1517: 
 1518:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1519:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1520:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1521:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1522:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1523: 
 1524:     FuncInfoItems = [all, traced, match_spec, meta, meta_match_spec,
 1525:                      call_count, call_time, call_memory],
 1526:     [{Item,undefined} = trace:info(S, {?MODULE, false, 77}, Item)
 1527:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1528:     [{Item,false} = trace:info(S, MFA, Item)
 1529:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1530: 
 1531:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1532:     ok.
 1533: 
 1534: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1535: error_info(_Config) ->
 1536:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1537:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1538:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1539:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1540:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1541:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1542: 
 1543:     L = [
 1544:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1545:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1546:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1547:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1548:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1549:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1550: 
 1551:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1552:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1553:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1554:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1555:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1556:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1557: 
 1558: 
 1559:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1560:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1561:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1562:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1563:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1564:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1565: 
 1566:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1567:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1568:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1569: 
 1570:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1571:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1572:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1573: 
 1574:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1575:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1576:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1577:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1578:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1579: 
 1580:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1581:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1582:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1583:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1584: 
 1585:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1586:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1587:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1588: 
 1589:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]},
 1590: 
 1591:          {delivered, 2} %% Cannot fail
 1592:         ],
 1593: 
 1594:     try
 1595:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L, [allow_nyi])
 1596:     after
 1597:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1598:     end.
 1599: 
 1600: 
 1601: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1602:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1603: 
 1604: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1605: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1606:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1607:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1608: 
 1609: foo() ->
 1610:     ok.
 1611: 
 1612: exported(X) ->
 1613:     local(X).
 1614: 
 1615: local(_) ->
 1616:     ok.
 1617: 
 1618: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1619:     tracer(Name, Tester, true).
 1620: 
 1621: tracer(Name, Tester, Display) ->
 1622:     case Display of
 1623:         true -> put(display,true);
 1624:         _ -> ok
 1625:     end,
 1626:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1627: 
 1628: 
 1629: tracer_loop(Name, Tester) ->
 1630:     receive M ->
 1631:             io_format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1632:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1633:     end,
 1634:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1635: 
 1636: 
 1637: receive_any() ->
 1638:     receive_any(1000).
 1639: 
 1640: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1641:     receive M -> M
 1642:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1643:     end.
 1644: 
 1645: receive_nothing() ->
 1646:     receive_any(10).
 1647: 
 1648: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1649: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1650: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1651: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1652: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1653:     ok;
 1654: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1655:     M = receive_any(),
 1656:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1657: 
 1658: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1659:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1660:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1661:         {true, []} ->
 1662:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1663:         {true, _} ->
 1664:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1665:         {false, _} ->
 1666:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1667:     end;
 1668: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1669:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1670:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1671:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1672:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1673: 
 1674: %% Same as receive_parallel/1 but accepts a *list* of message lists
 1675: %% and the message lists are allowed to be empty meaning no expected messages.
 1676: receive_parallel_list(List0) ->
 1677:     List1 = lists:filter(fun(E) -> E =/= [] end, List0),
 1678:     receive_parallel(list_to_tuple(List1)).
 1679: 
 1680: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1681:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1682: 
 1683: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1684:     M = receive_any(),
 1685:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1686:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1687: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1688:     ok.
 1689: 
 1690: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1691:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1692:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1693:         false ->
 1694:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1695:     end;
 1696: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1697:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1698:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1699:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1700: 
 1701: 
 1702: 
 1703: match(A, A) -> true;
 1704: match('_', _) -> true;
 1705: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1706:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1707: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1708:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1709: match(_A, _B) ->
 1710:     false.
 1711: 
 1712: 
 1713: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1714:     ok.
